meanings.definition: Happening, moving, or able to move at a very high speed.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is ultrafast when chasing its prey.
meanings.sent2: The ultrafast train reached its destination in record time.
meanings.sent3: The ultrafast squirrel surprised everyone by beating the hare in the race.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrafast reflexes were like lightning in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The ultrafast spaceship zoomed through the galaxy effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Done or completed in a very short amount of time.
meanings.sent1: The ultrafast decision saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The ultrafast delivery service impressed all the customers.
meanings.sent3: The ultrafast chef cooked dinner in a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: His ultrafast typing skills amazed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The ultrafast response to the emergency prevented a disaster.
